column5: Hey guys!! We just returned from our first ever walleye fishing trip. Had a GREAT week at Woman Lake Lodge just North of Ear Falls. I know I had tons of questions about walleye fishing and found it not near as intimidating as we had thought. Caught tons of fish every day mainly on minnows. Beautiful country and would love to try to go again.
Glad you had a great trip. You'll go again. It's addicting!
Go where the fish are. Works every time.

Glad your first experience was so good! I have been to that resort in the past and that area definitely offers what I consider the full Canadian fishing experience. PM me if you are considering going back and would be interested in a few stories I heard from a few long time guests I visited with while there.
Glad you had a good time. Tell us more, did you have any problems? Is there anything you'd do differently? What advice worked and what advice didn't?

It seems like your trip went well for you, that's awesome! I think everyone should get a chance to go on a fishing trip like that at least once per year (make that 10 times per year), to me there is nothing as enjoyable as being away from the hustle and bustle of the big cities and getting out into the great wilderness. I always get excited months in advance for my fishing trips, kinda like Christmas when I was young. Good Luck!
